sentences.en: Congress is waiting to see how the Oval Office will react.
sentences.cn: 国会正观望总统方面的反应。

sentences.en: He could react rather jealously when and if another child comes on the scene.
sentences.cn: 如果别的孩子也加入其中，他可能会表现得相当嫉妒。

sentences.en: He reacted angrily to the suggestion that he had lied.
How did he react to your suggestion?
How do acids react on metals?
sentences.cn: 酸对金属会起什么样的化学反应?

sentences.en: I don't react anymore when opponents try to niggle me.
sentences.cn: 对手找茬惹我时，我不会再理他们。

sentences.en: It's natural to react with disbelief if your child is accused of bullying.
sentences.cn: 如果你的孩子被指责欺负了别的孩子，你不相信是很正常的。

sentences.en: My father never saved money and perhaps I reacted against that.
sentences.cn: 我父亲从不攒钱，也许我反对这种做法。

sentences.en: Nations react strongly to unauthorized overflights.
sentences.cn: 各国对未经授权的飞越领空行为都会作出激烈反应。

sentences.en: Peonies react badly to being moved and are best left undisturbed.
sentences.cn: 牡丹花不宜挪移，最好别去动它。

sentences.en: Primitive humans needed to be able to react like this to escape from dangerous animals.
sentences.cn: 原始人必须要能作出这样的反应以逃避危险的动物。

sentences.en: She reacted very badly (= was very upset ) when her parents split up.
sentences.cn: 父母离婚的时候，她非常难过。

sentences.en: Someone allergic to milk is likely to react to cheese.
sentences.cn: 对牛奶过敏的人可能对奶酪也有不良反应。

sentences.en: The police must be able to react swiftly in an emergency.
sentences.cn: 警方在面对紧急情况时必须能迅速作出反应.

sentences.en: There'dbe no telling how John would react to such news as this.
sentences.cn: 还不知道约翰听到这样的消息会作何反应。
他们会作出挑衅性的反应。

sentences.en: Under normal circumstances, these two gases react readily to produce carbon dioxide and water.
sentences.cn: 在正常情况下，这两种气体容易发生反应产生二氧化碳和水。

sentences.en: You have to react quickly to circumstances.
sentences.cn: 你必须对形势迅速作出反应。

trans.tran_en: to behave in a particular way or show a particular emotion because of something that has happened or been said
